board.name: CY8CKIT-062S2-43012
board.summary: The CY8CKIT-062S2-43012 PSoC 6 Wi-Fi BT Pioneer Kit is a low-cost hardware platform that enables design and debug of PSoC 6 MCUs. It comes with a Murata LBEE5KL1DX module, based on the CYW43012 combo device, industry-leading CapSense for touch buttons and slider, on-board debugger/programmer with KitProg3, microSD card interface, 512-Mb Quad-SPI NOR flash, PDM-PCM microphone, and a thermistor. This kit is designed with a snap-away form-factor, allowing the user to separate the different components and features that come with this kit and use independently. In addition, support for Digilent's Pmod interface is also provided with this kit.
board.prov_capabilities: psoc6 cyw43xxx arduino led switch wifi bt usb_device usb_host capsense qspi memory
board.description:
Kit Features:
  • Support of up to 2MB Flash and 1MB SRAM
  • Dedicated SDHC to interface with WICED wireless devices.
  • Delivers dual-cores, with a 150-MHz Arm Cortex-M4 as the primary application processor and a 100-MHz Arm Cortex-M0+ as the secondary processor for low-power operations.
  • Supports Full-Speed USB, capacitive-sensing with CapSense, a PDM-PCM digital microphone interface, a Quad-SPI interface, 13 serial communication blocks, 7 programmable analog blocks, and 56 programmable digital blocks.

Kit Contents:
  • PSoC 6 Wi-Fi BT Prototyping Board
  • USB Type-A to Micro-B cable
  • Quick Start Guide
